Dating: GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD; ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Wesekh-collar (cartonnage)
Description: Cartonnage reproducing a wesekh-collar, with a decoration of concentric semicircles building up the design of the rows of pearls alternating with lotus flowers. It ends in two falcon's heads. At the top, the winged solar disc can be discerned, representation of Behedety.
